basics.name: Miguel Claramunt
basics.label: Data Scientist
basics.summary: Data Scientist with a strong foundation in AI, data science, and analytics, combining academic and industry experience to deliver scalable, data-driven solutions. Skilled in machine translation, deep learning, and large-scale data systems, with a track record of optimizing workflows, reducing costs, and enhancing decision-making for organizations.

work.name: Language Technologies Laboratory, Barcelona Supercomputing Center
work.summary: Engineered state-of-the-art machine translation systems, applying deep learning techniques to enhance multilingual NLP pipelines. Collaborated in cutting-edge research, optimizing translation pipelines and advancing state-of-the-art computational linguistics solutions for large-scale applications.

work.name: Leeos Merch
work.summary: Developed Customer Service solutions for four online merchandising stores of top Spanish-speaking content creators on YouTube and Twitch.

work.name: SDG Group
work.summary: Developed BI solutions for CaixaBank, enabling strategic and organizational decision-making. Maintained the 'Mis Ventas' Qlik Sense app serving 40K+ daily users with real-time updates, engineered ETL pipelines processing 500K+ records monthly, and streamlined workflows to reduce costs.

work.name: Intelligent Data Analysis Laboratory (IDAL), Universitat de València

awards.title: City of Valencia Data Visualization Award
awards.awarder: Chair of Gamification and Open Government of València (Càtedra de Ludificació i Govern Obert a la Ciutat de València)

volunteer.summary: Led a 9-monitor team for 2 years, organizing weekly activities for up to 20 children. Coordinated an 11-day summer camp with a 14-member team, overseeing activities for 50+ children.

publications.name: From SALAMANDRA to SALAMANDRATA: BSC Submission for WMT25 General Machine Translation Shared Task
publications.publisher: Proceedings of the Tenth Conference on Machine Translation
publications.summary: J. García-Gilabert, X. Liao, S. Da-Dalt, E. Bohman, A. Mash, F. De-Luca-Fornaciari, I. Baucells, J. Llop, M. Claramunt, C. Escolano, M. Melero (2025). Proceedings of the Tenth Conference on Machine Translation.

publications.name: Culture-aware machine translation: the case study of low-resource language pair Catalan-Chinese
publications.publisher: Proceedings of Machine Translation Summit XX
publications.summary: X. Liao, C. Escolano, A. Mash, F. De-Luca-Fornaciari, J. García-Gilabert, M. Claramunt, E. Bohman, and M. Melero (2025). Proceedings of Machine Translation Summit XX, 150–161.

presentations.name: Detecting and Mitigating Bias in AI Systems: Webcafé with Javi García Gilabert and Miguel Claramunt
